channel.title: Sports

item.title: 5 Reasons Why Packers Could Still Go on Playoff Run Without Micah Parsons
item.description: The Packers may have lost superstar Micah Parsons to injury, but here's why they could still be a contender in the NFC.

item.title: College Football Transfer Portal: Top Quarterbacks' Landing Spots
item.description: From DJ Lagway to Dylan Raiola, RJ Young shares his top landing spots for the hopeful transfer quarterbacks.

item.title: 2025 NFL Coach of the Year Odds: Mike Vrabel Favored, Mike Macdonald Closing Gap
item.description: Mike Vrabel is the favorite for Coach of the Year but a coach from the NFC West is quickly closing the gap.

item.title: FIFA slashes some WC ticket prices after backlash
item.description: FIFA slashed the price of some World Cup tickets for teams' most loyal fans following a global backlash.

item.title: Rams still hope injured Adams can play in Seattle
item.description: The Rams have not ruled out Davante Adams for Thursday night's showdown against the Seahawks, despite the star wide receiver's hamstring injury.
